title: Serene Hon Tam Island Retreat near Nha Trang Beach with Daily Breakfast, Stunning Swimming Pool & Tranquil Onsite Spa
description: Hugged by the azure waters of the East Sea, indulge in barefoot island luxury with a lavish stay at this five-star resort on Vietnam's Hon Tam Island. A short boat ride from Nha Trang, savour delectable Asian-European delicacies at the resort's two onsite restaurants, pamper yourself with a signature massage at the spa or take a dip in the sparkling pool. Spend your days soaking up the breathtaking nature and sea vistas, and bask in world-class tropical bliss.
offer_address: Hon Tam Island, Vinh Nguyen Ward, Nha Trang, Khanh Hoa, Vietnam
